tool.name: lordecstat
tool.description: is an efficient tool to generate statistics on solid and weak k-mers in PacBio corrected reads
tool.help:
**Description** Program to generate statistics on solid and weak k-mers after correcting sequencing errors in PacBio reads using highly accurate short reads (e.g. Illumina).
LoRDEC outputs the corrected reads to the given file in FASTA format. The regions that remain weak after the correction are outputted in lower case characters and the solid regions are outputted in upper case characters.
